title: Side Effects of Coming To America (with Desmond Thorne)
description:
This week, we crossover with fellow SFB podcast Adventures in Black Cinema and break down the classic comedy Coming to American with host Desmond Thorne.
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!
~
